title.narrative: STEM Mathematics Teacher Education (IRIS CONNECT software)

description.narrative:
Support dialogue and knowledge exchange between the UK and SA around STEM education approaches for improved curricula for primary, secondary and tertiary STEM education. • Support development of new and improved pedagogies and teaching and learning resources, relevant to SA context and development need, leading to enhanced capacity for teaching STEM subjects. • Support centres of excellence for STEM education in SA through partnerships with UK experts. • Equip students with a better understanding and appreciation of STEM education in an international context
This will mean more students with relevant skills and knowledge pursue a STEMrelated career, thus building absorptive capacity for research and innovation in country.

The STEM Education Programme will support knowledge exchange and partnership opportunities with the UK on STEM education approaches and in doing so build the human resource capacity in a vital area for economic development and social wellbeing.
